Just like the first chapter, Portal 2 is not just a game, but a world into which the player or players, can drop and work together to get through the various levels. The environment soundtrack help to increase the player engagement to resolve the various puzzle he will have to fight, chamber after chamber.

One of my favourite games so far. It is one of the best games I had ever played. Even today, after 10 years the original release, remain modern, fun and tricky. It is a masterpiece.

Good Game. I hated my Friend for a while. Would Recommend it.

Earlier in the year I put together my first gaming rig, after a lifetime of console gaming. Went ALL OUT on the components, and after trying out the latest and greatest, i randomly decided to give 360/PS3 era games a run. An unexpected gaming detour but one that I am absolutely loving. Playing these classics at the level they were originally designed for has been like playing them afresh. I shudder at the thought of those old machines struggling to hit 25 FPS. 

It's been 10 years since i've played Portal 2, and - other than the loading screens after ever test chamber - it hasn't aged a day. Nostalgia works in funny ways, and playing it at 4K, 120 FPS feels like how i remember it from back in 2011 on my 360. 

Peerless writing, outstanding puzzles, and a vibe so fresh it's bordering on timeless. 

If you've not played it after all this time, get it done. Pennies for one of the most original and enjoyable games ever made.

Next up, Bioshock Infinite.

Most of the great games have sequels and this is proof that the second parts can be equal to or even better than their predecessors, a sequel that, in order not to give revelations, I will say that at first it seems that it will be more of the same but as it develops the history and the game in general you realize that it brings many surprises without a doubt the story that gives continuity to the first game is quite entertaining with dramatic turns of events that I invite you to discover and a cooperative mode that works as a way to expand the experience together with a friend.
Simply a game and a fantastic saga.

I preordered this game when it was first coming out and bought it as soon as it dropped. I used to take my crappy laptop everywhere just to specifically play this game. It has honestly been and will always probably be one of my favorite games of all time. The humor is dark yet still rather funny. The series can have times where the humor is dark for the sake of being dark as it fits the creepy science aesthetic but otherwise it is pretty great! 8/8 would r8!
